name: VHM
short_description:
VHM (Virtual House Master) is the general domotic projekt for a couple of applications that control sensors and actors in houses and gardens.

The Infrastructure will look like a server-sytem on Linux Debian (WinNT will be posible too) written in plattform independent programming language python.
Sensors and actors will be connected to  Microcontroller boards which communicate over a CAN-bus-system and alternative over a classic ethernet-system. 

What is my intension to make such a project?
Mainly as an private hobby at now but maybe a comercial thing in the future.
